description: Create an AWS Lambda function URL
name: lambda-function-url

optionalFields.Synopsis: the Lambda function URL auth type
optionalFields.Summary: The AuthType parameter determines how Lambda authenticates or authorizes requests to your function URL. Must be either `AWS_IAM` or `NONE`.

optionalFields.Synopsis: the principal to use when auth_type is `AWS_IAM`
optionalFields.Summary: The Principal parameter specifies the principal that is allowed to invoke the function.
